titleStmt.title: A treatise in iustification of the King.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Leonard Lichfield. Printer to the university,

notesStmt.note: The writer, in spite of his subject, was very anxious to avoid giving offence to the Parliament, and was clearly a resident in London, where this piece was no doubt printed with a counterfeit imprint. -- Cf. Madan.
Place and date of publication from Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
